presets.name: Beginner Friendly
presets.description:
This preset provides the smoothest transition from a casual player.
Softlocks and crashes are fixed and unexpected behaviours of the game are changed to what would be expected from a casual view.

presets.name: Valuable Pickups
presets.description:
This preset focus on having every single upgrade you find being valuable, as well as having diverse seeds.
Softlocks and crashes are fixed and other changes are made to improve seed variety.

presets.name: Fewest Changes
presets.description: This preset keeps the game as close as possible to how the original game operates. Only crashes are fixed.
